name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert - The Aftermath
name_original: Command & Conquer: Red Alert - The Aftermath
description:
Command & Conquer: Red Alert - The Aftermath is a strategy game developed by Westwood Studios. It came out on 24-09-1997. Virgin Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Command & Conquer: Red Alert - The Aftermath is available on PC.
Frank Klepacki scored the game.
